section.name: Download Pluto

div.p:
There are a number of distributions to choose from depending on your needs.
pluto-current-bundle - Provides Pluto and Tomcat bundled together. If you are getting started with Pluto, this is the distribution you want.
pluto-current-bin - Provides the Pluto libraries, portal and testsuite web applications. Includes ant tasks.
pluto-current-container-bin - Provides the Pluto container libraries only.
pluto-current-src - Provides the Pluto source code; requires that you build and deploy Pluto on your own.

section.p: The Apache Pluto source and binary distributions can be downloaded from a Pluto distribution mirror.
Please note: It was discovered during the 1.1.4 release process that Pluto 1.1.3 was not binary compatible with Pluto 1.1.2. The 1.1.4 release maintains binary compatability with 1.1.3.
Please note: Pluto 1.1.3 is not binary compatible with Pluto 1.1.2. The 1.1.x releases maintain binary compatability with 1.1.3.
